name: Dir En Grey
description: '''Dir En Grey''' (stylized as '''DIR EN GREY''' and previously as '''Dir en grey''') is a Japanese [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] band formed in February 1997 and currently signed to Firewall Div., a sub-division of [[Free-Will]]. With a consistent lineup of vocalist [[Kyo (musician)|Kyo]], guitarists [[Kaoru (musician)|Kaoru]] and [[Die (musician)|Die]], bassist [[Toshiya (musician)|Toshiya]], and drummer [[Shinya (Dir En Grey musician)|Shinya]], they have released eleven full-length albums. Numerous stylistic changes have made the genre of their music difficult to determine, though it is generally considered to be a form of metal. Originally a [[visual kei]] band, the members later opted for more subtle attire, but have continued to maintain a dramatic image on stage.
